Package weka.classifiers.rules.vfdr

Class VfdrRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.rules.vfdr.VfdrRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class VfdrRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a rule for the Vfdr algorithm. Rules are made of a conjunction of antecedents, and a set of sufficient statistics. Sufficient statistics determine the strategy used to classify instances (naive Bayes/ majority class).
    Version:
    VFDR-Base
    Author:
    Cl√©ment Fournier (clement.fournier@insa-rennes.fr)
    See Also:
    SufficientStats, Serialized Form

                               double confidence,
                               double weight)
        Computes the Hoeffding bound for the given parameters
        Parameters:
        range - Range of the split metric
        confidence - Confidence threshold
        weight - Weight of the observations made so far with this rule
        Returns:
        Hoeffding bound
